chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b

Premises:
uad_conv_0 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~0 end : ad -> ad
upl_conv_0 = fix upl_conv_0 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_0 a) (upl_conv_0 p0) (upl_conv_0 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
ad = N : Set
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
upl_conv_0_occur : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) (uad_conv_0 a) -> prec_occur pl a
adcnv_disj : forall a : ad, exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b \/ a = uad_conv_1 b
upl_conv_1_occur : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_1 pl) (uad_conv_1 a) -> prec_occur pl a
adcnv_inj0 : forall a b : ad, uad_conv_0 a = uad_conv_0 b -> a = b
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
adcnv_ok : forall a b : ad, uad_conv_0 a <> uad_conv_1 b
u_merge_0r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
adcnv_inj1 : forall a b : ad, uad_conv_1 a = uad_conv_1 b -> a = b
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
u_merge_1r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
not_true_is_false : forall b : bool, b <> true -> b = false
u_conv_0_invar_8 : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (s0 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> exists a1 : ad, a0 = uad_conv_0 a1
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
N.lxor_comm : forall a b : N, N.lxor a b = N.lxor b a
orb_true_r : forall b : bool, b || true = true
union_s0d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c0 : ad) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) -> c <> c0 -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c0 pl0)) (app c tl)
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
upl_conv_0_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_0 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_0 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_0 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_0 ls0
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
union_s1d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> a <> c -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
MapSweep_semantics_2_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf fp : ad -> ad), (forall a0 : ad, fp (pf a0) = a0) -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep1 A f pf m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m (fp a) = Some y
u_conv_1_invar_8 : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (s0 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> exists a1 : ad, a0 = uad_conv_1 a1
Sumbool.sumbool_of_bool : forall b : bool, {b = true} + {b = false}

```coq
intros pl a H.
induction H using prec_occur_ind.
- intros a0 pl0 pl1.
  exists (uad_conv_0 a0).
  reflexivity.
- intros a0 b pl0 pl1 H0 IH.
  destruct (adcnv_disj b) as [b0 | b0].
  + exists b0.
    rewrite <- H0.
    apply upl_conv_0_occur.
    assumption.
  + assert (H1: uad_conv_0 b0 <> uad_conv_1 b).
    intro H1.
    apply adcnv_ok in H1.
    contradiction.
    exists b0.
    rewrite <- H0.
    apply upl_conv_1_occur.
    assumption.
- intros a0 b pl0 pl1 H0 IH.
  destruct (adcnv_disj b) as [b0 | b0].
  + exists b0.
    rewrite <- H0.
    apply upl_conv_0_occur.
    assumption.
  + assert (H1: uad_conv_0 b0 <> uad_conv_1 b).
    intro H1.
    apply adcnv_ok in H1.
    contradiction.
    exists b0.
    rewrite <- H0.
    apply upl_conv_1_occur.
    assumption.
Qed.

original: intros pl a H. induction H using prec_occur_ind. - intros a0 pl0 pl1. exists (uad_conv_0 a0). reflexivity. - intros a0 b pl0 pl1 H0 IH. destruct (adcnv_disj b) as [b0 | b0]. + exists b0. rewrite <- H0. apply upl_conv_0_occur. auto. + assert (H1: uad_conv_0 b0 <> uad_conv_1 b). intro H1. apply adcnv_ok in H1. contradiction. exists b0. rewrite <- H0. apply upl_conv_1_occur. auto. - intros a0 b pl0 pl1 H0 IH. destruct (adcnv_disj b) as [b0 | b0]. + exists b0. rewrite <- H0. apply upl_conv_0_occur. auto. + assert (H1: uad_conv_0 b0 <> uad_conv_1 b). intro H1. apply adcnv_ok in H1. contradiction. exists b0. rewrite <- H0. apply upl_conv_1_occur. auto.
